Label.en: The new market was called... 'novum forum'... which means... the new market!
Label.fr: Le nouveau marché était appelé... 'novum forum'... nouveau marché quoi !
Label.es: The new market was called... 'novum forum'... which means... the new market!
Label.zh: The new market was called... 'novum forum'... which means... the new market!

Label.en: You can see how the area changed over the years from these maps...
Label.fr: Tu peux aggrandir ces cartes pour voir comment le lieu a changé au fil des ans !
Label.es: You can see how the area changed over the years from these maps...
Label.zh: You can see how the area changed over the years from these maps...

Label.en: As you can see, it was a meeting point for many important roads
Label.fr: Il se trouvait au point de rencontre de routes particulièrement importantes
Label.es: As you can see, it was a meeting point for many important roads
Label.zh: As you can see, it was a meeting point for many important roads
